name: Portfolio Template
description: A modern personal portfolio website template

base_files.content:
# {{project_name}}

A modern portfolio website built with Next.js and TailwindCSS.

## Features

- Responsive design for all device sizes
- Dynamic project showcase
- Contact form with validation
- Animation and transitions for enhanced UX
- SEO optimized

## Getting Started

```bash
# Install dependencies
npm install

# Run development server
npm run dev

# Build for production
npm run build

# Start production server
npm start
```

## Deployment

This site can be easily deployed to Vercel, Netlify, or any static hosting service.

```bash
# Deploy to Vercel
vercel
```
